mission_data.playerShipNames_arme: TSN Sabre\TSN Valiant\TSN Lancer\TSN Stalker\TSN Viper\TSN Horizon\TSN Necessity\TSN Hunter

set_ship_text.name: Kashawn Trading
set_ship_text.desc: Enyalius' primary hub for trade with the Tibur system.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The station commander is renowned for their honor and bravery, but has no combat experience.

set_ship_text.name: ESN Yuroman
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The captain is the USFP's leading expert on tetracalcite.
set_ship_text.hailtext: Would you like to export some tetracalcite?

set_ship_text.name: Kalnath Research
set_ship_text.desc: Research station investigating applications of a rare harmonic mineral, tetracalcite.
set_ship_text.hailtext: Would you like to export some tetracalcite?

set_ship_text.name: Idrissa Idyl
set_ship_text.desc: Trading post for luxury goods, equipped with a small refit shipyard.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The station chief got the post through bribery and is allegedly associated with pirates.
set_ship_text.hailtext: Rumours of our involvement with pirates are completely unfounded.

set_ship_text.name: Rysdak Markets
set_ship_text.desc: Central trading post for all traffic transiting Enyalius.

set_ship_text.name: Hulca Smelters
set_ship_text.desc: Enyalius' main industrial base, processing ore and denabite from the highly productive asteroid mines in the sector.

set_ship_text.name: Yknik Spas
set_ship_text.desc: Deluxe resort for our esteemed guests in Enyalius. High-quality saltwater spas enriched with tetracalcite. Harmonize your chakras with tetracalcite therapy! Luxury massages, peelings, gill cleansing, manicure, scale-shining, and more.
